sentences.en: “But not to worry: it all . . . falls into place in the book's second half, where the language is plainer”(&b{Hallowell Bowser})
sentences.cn: “但别担心：它全都在书的后半部分，那儿的语言浅显一些”(&b{哈洛韦尔·鲍瑟})

sentences.en: "Don't worry about me," I said. "I'll be okay."
sentences.cn: “别担心我，”我说，“我不会有事的。”

sentences.en: All kids her age do silly things; it's nothing to worry about.
sentences.cn: 她这个年龄的孩子都会做傻事，根本不用担心。

sentences.en: As his energy drained away, his despair and worry grew.
sentences.cn: 当他的精力耗尽时，他的绝望和担心也增加了。

sentences.en: children should be allowed to pause in their reading to worry out a meaning.
sentences.cn: 应该允许孩子们在阅读中间停顿一下，好好想一下文章的意思。

sentences.en: Doesn’t it worry you that Sarah spends so much time away from home?
sentences.cn: 萨拉整天往外跑，你不担心吗？

sentences.en: Don’t tell Mum about this – she’s got enough to worry about (= she already has a lot of problems or is very busy ) .
sentences.cn: 别把这件事告诉妈妈——她已经够操心的了。

sentences.en: Don't worry yourself about me, I can take care of myself.
sentences.cn: 你别担心我，我能照顾好自己。

sentences.en: Don't worry, Uncle Tim, your future is safe in our hands.
sentences.cn: 别担心，蒂姆大叔，你将来由我们照顾。

sentences.en: Don't worry, your luggage will come on afterwards by taxi.
sentences.cn: 别担心，你的行李随后会由出租车送过来。

sentences.en: Don't worry. We'll have you out of here double-quick.
sentences.cn: 别担心，我们会很快把你从这儿弄出去的。

sentences.en: Don't you worry about them when they're out of doors?
sentences.cn: 他们在室外的时候，你不担心吗？

sentences.en: Frankly, Thomas, this question of your loan is beginning to worry me.
sentences.cn: 老实讲，托马斯，你贷款的问题开始让我担心了。

sentences.en: Germans worry that their economy is going down the plughole.
sentences.cn: 德国人担心他们的经济会滑入深渊。

sentences.en: He has exhibited symptoms of anxiety and overwhelming worry.
sentences.cn: 他表现出焦躁不安和过度忧虑的症状。

sentences.en: He'll never leave you. You need have no worry.
sentences.cn: 他不会离开你的，你不用担心。

sentences.en: He’s been a constant source of worry .
sentences.cn: 他总是让人担心。

sentences.en: I didn’t tell Mum and Dad – I didn’t want to worry them.
sentences.cn: 我没告诉爸妈——我不想让他们担心。

sentences.en: My main worry was that Madeleine Johnson would still be there.
sentences.cn: 我最担心的是马德琳·约翰逊仍会在那儿。

sentences.en: The heat didn’t seem to worry him.
sentences.cn: 酷热似乎并没有让他烦恼。

sentences.en: The recent changes in the Earth’s climate are beginning to worry scientists.
sentences.cn: 近来地球的气候变化使科学家开始担忧起来。

sentences.en: This was a genuine mistake, but it did cause me some worry.
sentences.cn: 这是好心办错事，可是确实让我担心了一阵子。

sentences.en: You don't have to worry about me. I'm a good swimmer.
sentences.cn: 你不用担心我。我水性很好。

sentences.en: You’ve really got no need to worry about your weight.
sentences.cn: 你真的不必担心你的体重。

words.tran_cn: 令人烦恼的，令人不安的；麻烦的
自寻烦恼的人；杞人忧天者

phrases.tran_cn: 没什么可担心的；没必要着急的

trans.tran_en: the feeling of being anxious about something
to make someone feel anxious about something
to be anxious or unhappy about someone or something, so that you think about them a lot
to be anxious or unhappy about someone or something, so that you think about them a lot
